#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long lint;
#define mod 1000000007
lint power(lint a, lint n)  //a^n
{
    lint ans=1;
    while(n)
    {
        if(n & 1)
            ans=(ans*a)%mod;
        a=(a*a)%mod;
        n>>=1;
    }
    return ans;
}
int main()
{
    lint test;
    scanf("%lld", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        lint n, ans, inv4;
        scanf("%lld", &n);
        if(n&1)
        {
            ans=7*power(3, n)-1;
        }
        else
        {
            ans=7*power(3, n)+1;
        }
        inv4=power(4, mod-2);
        ans=((ans%mod)* (inv4%mod))%mod;
        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
